docs.snippet: The former clinic owner accused of selling performance-enhancing drugs to Alex Rodriguez has agreed to plead guilty in what prosecutors called a wide-ranging conspiracy to distribute steroids to both major league ballplayers and high school athlet...
docs.lead_paragraph: The former clinic owner accused of selling performance-enhancing drugs to Alex Rodriguez has agreed to plead guilty in what prosecutors called a wide-ranging conspiracy to distribute steroids to both major league ballplayers and high school athletes.

headline.main: Clinic Owner Tied to MLB Scandal to Plead Guilty
headline.print_headline: Clinic Owner Tied to MLB Scandal to Plead Guilty

docs.snippet: Martin Kaymer looked unbeatable earlier this year when he went wire-to-wire (with ties) to win The Players Championship, and then wire-to-wire (no ties) for an eight-shot victory in the U.S. Open at Pinehurst No. 2....
docs.lead_paragraph: Martin Kaymer looked unbeatable earlier this year when he went wire-to-wire (with ties) to win The Players Championship, and then wire-to-wire (no ties) for an eight-shot victory in the U.S. Open at Pinehurst No. 2.

headline.main: Kaymer: Shoulder Slightly Injured at British Open
headline.print_headline: Kaymer: Shoulder Slightly Injured at British Open

docs.snippet: Andrew McCutchen has a broken bone in his ribcage wo days after being hit by a pitch, but the Pittsburgh Pirates center fielder and last year's NL MVP hopes to avoid going on the disabled list....
docs.lead_paragraph: Andrew McCutchen has a broken bone in his ribcage wo days after being hit by a pitch, but the Pittsburgh Pirates center fielder and last year's NL MVP hopes to avoid going on the disabled list.

headline.main: McCutchen Has Broken Rib, Hoping to Avoid DL
headline.print_headline: McCutchen Has Broken Rib, Hoping to Avoid DL

docs.snippet: Media company Walt Disney Co's quarterly profit blew past Wall Street expectations, with a muscular performance from its "Captain America" movie, higher attendance at U.S. theme parks and brisk sales of merchandise tied to mega-hit "Frozen."...
docs.lead_paragraph: Media company Walt Disney Co's quarterly profit blew past Wall Street expectations, with a muscular performance from its "Captain America" movie, higher attendance at U.S. theme parks and brisk sales of merchandise tied to mega-hit "Frozen."

headline.main: Disney Profit Jumps Thanks to Movies, Parks, Products
headline.print_headline: Disney Profit Jumps Thanks to Movies, Parks, Products

docs.snippet: With Time Warner Inc.’s rejection last month of an $80 billion bid by Rupert Murdoch’s 21st Century Fox, the mating ritual had begun, or so it seemed....
docs.lead_paragraph: With Time Warner Inc.’s rejection last month of an $80 billion bid by Rupert Murdoch’s 21st Century Fox, the mating ritual had begun, or so it seemed.
docs.abstract: Mating ritual begins between Rupert Murdoch's 21st Century Fox and Time Warner Inc, which has rejected his $80 billion hostile takeover bid; Time Warner's unyielding stance has at least some analysts wondering if an acquisition really is inevitable.

headline.main: Time Warner Rebuff of Fox May Not Just Be Negotiating Ploy

byline.contributor: Michael J. de la Merced contributed reporting.
